frontmatter.title: Lab: Building SaaS with Prompts Only

labPresets.initialPrompt: Design a SaaS workflow using only prompt chaining. Example: An expense tracker that takes receipts as input, extracts details, and generates a monthly report.

examples: SaaS Idea: Automated resume screener. Step 1 — Extract skills; Step 2 — Compare with job description; Step 3 — Output candidate fit score.
SaaS Idea: Customer support triager. Step 1 — Classify tickets; Step 2 — Generate responses; Step 3 — Escalate critical issues.

quiz.q: True or False: SaaS workflows can be prototyped entirely with chained prompts before writing backend code.
Which of these is an example of a prompt-only SaaS prototype?
